title: Science Concept Systematization Education Through Failure-Based Learning

context.additional_context: Use of smartphone-based learning materials, emphasis on concept reconstruction through failure case studies

learning_goals: Learners can identify core conceptual elements in partial failure cases with over 70% accuracy.
Learners can explain three components of scientific concepts based on failure case analysis.
Learners can solve concept application problems with 80% accuracy during explicit instruction phases.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
